Posts.Content: My wife 34 years old has been diagnosed with Triple Negative Metaplastic Carcinoma.Size of tumor was 3.2 cm and was grade 3 had ductal with myxoid matrix and focal spracoutous areas. Lumpectomy done followed by 4 rounds of cemotherapy of AEC. Now 4 rounds of Taxane to be given then 25 sittings of radiations. Kindly guide if some better drugs are available to avoid recurrence please......
Posts.Title: Triple Negative Metaplastic Carcinoma
